302: Payroll SpecialistApply Now ( Save Job Job SavedJob IDREQ_175168 FACILITYRiedman Campus LOCATIONRochester, New YorkSUMMARYAs a Payroll Specialist, your strong attention to detail and commitment to accuracy ensures proper compensation and timely distribution of paychecks.STATUS: Full timeLOCATION: Riedman CampusDEPARTMENT: PayrollSCHEDULE: Monday - Friday daysATTRIBUTES+ A minimum of two (2) years of experience in payroll required+ Strong analytical, computer and communication skillsRESPONSIBILITIES+ Payroll Management.Demonstrate understanding of work flow and methodology for processing payroll; handle all incoming garnishments; log-in, set-up and monitor balances; adjust employee benefits banks, PTO, vacation and any payroll errors; order vendor checks for payroll deductions (insurance, tax-sheltered annuities, etc.)+ Processing.Process KA entries, payroll adjustments/corrections, professional services, retro pay increases, special manual checks for errors and TC1 entries (online time entries or corrections); process terminated employee benefits after accruals and review flex dollars and deductions+ Auditing.Conduct full auditing of all time sheets and time documents and full processing of disability and workers compensation paymentsPHYSICAL REQUIREMENTSS - Sedentary Work - Exerting up to 10 pounds of force occasionally Sedentary work involves sitting most of the time, but may involve walking or standing for brief periods of time.
